title: Custom Sync and FXA
name: custom-sync-fxa
description: Add-on to customize server addresses for Server Sync and Firefox Accounts. You only need put the domain or IP and port in the input for each service, the Add-on complete the task and and adds the rest of URL in each preferences.

preferences.name: urlsync
preferences.title: Server Sync
preferences.description: The domain or IP and port (if necessary) for your own Sync Server.

preferences.name: usesync
preferences.title: Use Sync
preferences.description: Mark if use your own Sync Server.

preferences.name: urlauth
preferences.title: Server Auth
preferences.description: The domain or IP and port (if necessary) for your own Firefox Auth Server.

preferences.name: useauth
preferences.title: Use Auth
preferences.description: Mark if use your own Firefox Auth Server.

preferences.name: urlcontent
preferences.title: Server Content
preferences.description: The domain or IP and port (if necessary) for your own Firefox Content Server.

preferences.name: usecontent
preferences.title: Use Content
preferences.description: Mark for use your own Firefox Content Server.
